nlq: Which product lines are available in the catalog?
sql: SELECT productLine FROM productlines ORDER BY productLine;

nlq: Return product codes and names for all products, sorted by product code.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName FROM products ORDER BY productCode;

nlq: Show product codes, names, and vendors for all products.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName, productVendor FROM products ORDER BY productCode;

nlq: Show the list of office codes with their cities, countries, and phone numbers.
sql: SELECT officeCode, city, country, phone FROM offices ORDER BY officeCode;

nlq: List employee numbers with names and job titles.
sql: SELECT employeeNumber, firstName, lastName, jobTitle FROM employees ORDER BY employeeNumber;

nlq: Show employee email addresses with their office code.
sql: SELECT employeeNumber, email, officeCode FROM employees ORDER BY employeeNumber;

nlq: Show the first 20 customers ordered by customer name.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName FROM customers ORDER BY customerName LIMIT 20;

nlq: List customer contact names (first and last) with the customer name.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, contactFirstName, contactLastName FROM customers ORDER BY customerNumber;

nlq: List the distinct customer countries in this database.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM customers ORDER BY country;

nlq: Show the most recent 25 orders by order date.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status, customerNumber FROM orders ORDER BY orderDate DESC LIMIT 25;

nlq: List the first 25 payments by payment date.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, checkNumber, paymentDate, amount FROM payments ORDER BY paymentDate LIMIT 25;

nlq: Show the five products with the highest MSRP.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName, MSRP FROM products ORDER BY MSRP DESC LIMIT 5;

nlq: Show the five products with the lowest buy price.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products ORDER BY buyPrice ASC LIMIT 5;

nlq: List all order statuses that appear in the orders table.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT status FROM orders ORDER BY status;

nlq: Show customers with no sales representative assigned (salesRepEmployeeNumber is NULL).
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName FROM customers WHERE salesRepEmployeeNumber IS NULL ORDER BY customerNumber;

nlq: Show customers with a sales representative assigned.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, salesRepEmployeeNumber FROM customers WHERE salesRepEmployeeNumber IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customerNumber;

nlq: List the top 10 customers by credit limit.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers ORDER BY creditLimit DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Show products that have fewer than 200 units in stock.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName, quantityInStock FROM products WHERE quantityInStock < 200 ORDER BY quantityInStock;

nlq: List customer numbers and names for customers located in USA.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customerNumber;

nlq: Count how many customers are located in USA.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS customerCount FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';

nlq: List customer numbers and names for customers located in France.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName FROM customers WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY customerNumber;

nlq: Count how many customers are located in France.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS customerCount FROM customers WHERE country = 'France';

nlq: Show order numbers and dates for orders currently marked as Shipped.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Count the number of orders with status Shipped.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';

nlq: Show order numbers and dates for orders currently marked as Cancelled.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Cancelled' ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Count the number of orders with status Cancelled.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Cancelled';

nlq: Show order numbers and dates for orders currently marked as On Hold.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'On Hold' ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Count the number of orders with status On Hold.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE status = 'On Hold';

nlq: Show order numbers and dates for orders currently marked as Resolved.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Count the number of orders with status Resolved.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Resolved';

nlq: Show order numbers and dates for orders currently marked as Disputed.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Disputed' ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Count the number of orders with status Disputed.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Disputed';

nlq: Show order numbers and dates for orders currently marked as In Process.
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'In Process' ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Count the number of orders with status In Process.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE status = 'In Process';

nlq: List customers with a credit limit greater than 10000.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit > 10000 ORDER BY creditLimit DESC;

nlq: List customers with a credit limit greater than 50000.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit > 50000 ORDER BY creditLimit DESC;

nlq: List customers with a credit limit greater than 100000.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit > 100000 ORDER BY creditLimit DESC;

nlq: List customers with a credit limit greater than 150000.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit > 150000 ORDER BY creditLimit DESC;

nlq: Find customers whose credit limit is between 50,000 and 100,000.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY creditLimit DESC;

nlq: Find customers whose credit limit is below 10,000.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit < 10000 ORDER BY creditLimit;

nlq: List payments larger than 50,000, ordered from largest to smallest.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, checkNumber, paymentDate, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 50000 ORDER BY amount DESC;

nlq: List payments smaller than 100, ordered from smallest to largest.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, checkNumber, paymentDate, amount FROM payments WHERE amount < 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;

nlq: Show products where MSRP is at least 2.5 times the buy price.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice, MSRP FROM products WHERE MSRP >= 2.5 * buyPrice ORDER BY (MSRP / buyPrice) DESC;

nlq: List customers whose name begins with the letter B.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName FROM customers WHERE customerName LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY customerName;

nlq: List customers whose name contains the word 'Ltd'.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName FROM customers WHERE customerName LIKE '%Ltd%' ORDER BY customerName;

nlq: For each order, show the order number, order date, status, and the customer name.
sql: SELECT o.orderNumber, o.orderDate, o.status, c.customerName FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customerNumber = c.customerNumber ORDER BY o.orderDate;

nlq: Show each customer together with the full name of their sales representative (if assigned).
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, CONCAT(e.firstName, ' ', e.lastName) AS salesRep FROM customers c LEFT JOIN employees e ON c.salesRepEmployeeNumber = e.employeeNumber ORDER BY c.customerNumber;

nlq: List employees with the city and country of the office they work in.
sql: SELECT e.employeeNumber, e.firstName, e.lastName, o.city, o.country FROM employees e JOIN offices o ON e.officeCode = o.officeCode ORDER BY e.employeeNumber;

nlq: List order line items with product names (order number, product code, product name, quantity, and price each).
sql: SELECT od.orderNumber, od.productCode, p.productName, od.quantityOrdered, od.priceEach FROM orderdetails od JOIN products p ON od.productCode = p.productCode ORDER BY od.orderNumber, od.orderLineNumber;

nlq: Show orders with their total value (sum of quantityOrdered × priceEach) for each order.
sql: SELECT od.orderNumber, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS orderTotal FROM orderdetails od GROUP BY od.orderNumber ORDER BY orderTotal DESC;

nlq: Show each customer and how many orders they have placed.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, COUNT(o.orderNumber) AS orderCount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY orderCount DESC, c.customerNumber;

nlq: Show each customer and the total amount they have paid.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, COALESCE(SUM(p.amount),0) AS totalPaid FROM customers c LEFT JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalPaid DESC;

nlq: Show each customer and their total sales value (sum of line items across all orders).
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, COALESCE(SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach),0) AS totalSales FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber LEFT JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalSales DESC;

nlq: For each product line, show how many products belong to that line.
sql: SELECT productLine, COUNT(*) AS productCount FROM products GROUP BY productLine ORDER BY productCount DESC, productLine;

nlq: Show total revenue by product line (using order line quantities and prices).
sql: SELECT p.productLine, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS revenue FROM orderdetails od JOIN products p ON od.productCode = p.productCode GROUP BY p.productLine ORDER BY revenue DESC;

nlq: Show the top 10 customers by total sales value (orders × order details).
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS totalSales FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalSales DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Show the top 10 products by total quantity sold.
sql: SELECT p.productCode, p.productName, SUM(od.quantityOrdered) AS qtySold FROM orderdetails od JOIN products p ON od.productCode = p.productCode GROUP BY p.productCode, p.productName ORDER BY qtySold DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Show the top 10 products by revenue (quantityOrdered × priceEach).
sql: SELECT p.productCode, p.productName, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS revenue FROM orderdetails od JOIN products p ON od.productCode = p.productCode GROUP BY p.productCode, p.productName ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Which customers are handled by sales reps working in the San Francisco office?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.customerNumber, c.customerName FROM customers c JOIN employees e ON c.salesRepEmployeeNumber = e.employeeNumber JOIN offices o ON e.officeCode = o.officeCode WHERE o.city = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY c.customerNumber;

nlq: List employees who work in the San Francisco office.
sql: SELECT e.employeeNumber, e.firstName, e.lastName FROM employees e JOIN offices o ON e.officeCode = o.officeCode WHERE o.city = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY e.employeeNumber;

nlq: List product codes and names for products in the Classic Cars product line.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName FROM products WHERE productLine = 'Classic Cars' ORDER BY productCode;

nlq: Show the top 5 best-selling products (by quantity) within the Classic Cars product line.
sql: SELECT p.productCode, p.productName, SUM(od.quantityOrdered) AS qtySold FROM orderdetails od JOIN products p ON od.productCode = p.productCode WHERE p.productLine = 'Classic Cars' GROUP BY p.productCode, p.productName ORDER BY qtySold DESC LIMIT 5;

nlq: Show total revenue for the Classic Cars product line.
sql: SELECT SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS revenue FROM orderdetails od JOIN products p ON od.productCode = p.productCode WHERE p.productLine = 'Classic Cars';

nlq: Show total revenue for the Motorcycles product line.

nlq: How many orders were placed in 2003?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderDate) = 2003;

nlq: Show total revenue in 2003 based on order dates.
sql: SELECT SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS revenue FROM orders o JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber WHERE YEAR(o.orderDate) = 2003;

nlq: Show total payment amount recorded in 2003.
sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2003;

nlq: For 2003, count orders by status.
sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderDate) = 2003 GROUP BY status ORDER BY orderCount DESC;

nlq: How many orders were placed in 2004?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderDate) = 2004;

nlq: Show total revenue in 2004 based on order dates.
sql: SELECT SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS revenue FROM orders o JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber WHERE YEAR(o.orderDate) = 2004;

nlq: Show total payment amount recorded in 2004.
sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2004;

nlq: For 2004, count orders by status.
sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderDate) = 2004 GROUP BY status ORDER BY orderCount DESC;

nlq: How many orders were placed in 2005?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderDate) = 2005;

nlq: Show total revenue in 2005 based on order dates.
sql: SELECT SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS revenue FROM orders o JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber WHERE YEAR(o.orderDate) = 2005;

nlq: Show total payment amount recorded in 2005.
sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2005;

nlq: For 2005, count orders by status.
sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderDate) = 2005 GROUP BY status ORDER BY orderCount DESC;

sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2003 AND MONTH(paymentDate) = 1;

nlq: Compute total payments in 2004-08.
sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2004 AND MONTH(paymentDate) = 8;

nlq: Compute total payments in 2004-09.
sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2004 AND MONTH(paymentDate) = 9;

sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2004 AND MONTH(paymentDate) = 12;

sql: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalPayments FROM payments WHERE YEAR(paymentDate) = 2005 AND MONTH(paymentDate) = 1;

nlq: Find customers who have placed more than 5 orders.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, COUNT(o.orderNumber) AS orderCount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName HAVING COUNT(o.orderNumber) > 5 ORDER BY orderCount DESC;

nlq: Find customers who have made payments totaling more than 100,000.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(p.amount) AS totalPaid FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName HAVING SUM(p.amount) > 100000 ORDER BY totalPaid DESC;

nlq: List products that have never been ordered (no matching orderdetails rows).
sql: SELECT p.productCode, p.productName FROM products p LEFT JOIN orderdetails od ON p.productCode = od.productCode WHERE od.orderNumber IS NULL ORDER BY p.productCode;

nlq: List customers who have never made a payment.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName FROM customers c LEFT JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber WHERE p.customerNumber IS NULL ORDER BY c.customerNumber;

nlq: List customers who have orders but no payments.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.customerNumber, c.customerName FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber LEFT JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber WHERE p.customerNumber IS NULL ORDER BY c.customerNumber;

nlq: Find the customer(s) with the maximum credit limit.
sql: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit = (SELECT MAX(creditLimit) FROM customers) ORDER BY customerNumber;

nlq: Find products with quantity in stock below the average stock level.
sql: SELECT productCode, productName, quantityInStock FROM products WHERE quantityInStock < (SELECT AVG(quantityInStock) FROM products) ORDER BY quantityInStock;

nlq: Show employees who do not manage anyone (no direct reports).
sql: SELECT e.employeeNumber, e.firstName, e.lastName FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employees r ON r.reportsTo = e.employeeNumber WHERE r.employeeNumber IS NULL ORDER BY e.employeeNumber;

nlq: Show managers and how many employees report to them.
sql: SELECT m.employeeNumber, m.firstName, m.lastName, COUNT(e.employeeNumber) AS reportCount FROM employees m JOIN employees e ON e.reportsTo = m.employeeNumber GROUP BY m.employeeNumber, m.firstName, m.lastName ORDER BY reportCount DESC;

nlq: Find orders that were shipped after the required date (late shipments).
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, requiredDate, shippedDate FROM orders WHERE shippedDate IS NOT NULL AND shippedDate > requiredDate ORDER BY shippedDate DESC;

nlq: Find orders that have not shipped yet (shippedDate is NULL).
sql: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, requiredDate, status FROM orders WHERE shippedDate IS NULL ORDER BY orderDate;

nlq: Show the average order value per customer (average of order totals).
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, AVG(t.orderTotal) AS avgOrderValue FROM customers c JOIN (SELECT o.customerNumber, o.orderNumber, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS orderTotal FROM orders o JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber GROUP BY o.customerNumber, o.orderNumber) t ON c.customerNumber = t.customerNumber GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY avgOrderValue DESC;

nlq: Show customers whose total payments are less than their total sales (outstanding balance > 0).
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, COALESCE(pay.totalPaid,0) AS totalPaid, COALESCE(sales.totalSales,0) AS totalSales FROM customers c LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerNumber, SUM(amount) AS totalPaid FROM payments GROUP BY customerNumber) pay ON c.customerNumber = pay.customerNumber LEFT JOIN (SELECT o.customerNumber, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS totalSales FROM orders o JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber GROUP BY o.customerNumber) sales ON c.customerNumber = sales.customerNumber WHERE COALESCE(pay.totalPaid,0) < COALESCE(sales.totalSales,0) ORDER BY (COALESCE(sales.totalSales,0) - COALESCE(pay.totalPaid,0)) DESC;

nlq: Show the top 10 customers by total payments in 2003.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(p.amount) AS totalPaid FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber WHERE YEAR(p.paymentDate) = 2003 GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalPaid DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Show the top 10 customers by total payments in 2004.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(p.amount) AS totalPaid FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber WHERE YEAR(p.paymentDate) = 2004 GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalPaid DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Show the top 10 customers by total payments in 2005.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(p.amount) AS totalPaid FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customerNumber = p.customerNumber WHERE YEAR(p.paymentDate) = 2005 GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalPaid DESC LIMIT 10;

nlq: Show total sales value by customer for customers in USA.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS totalSales FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber WHERE c.country = 'USA' GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalSales DESC;

nlq: Show total sales value by customer for customers in France.
sql: SELECT c.customerNumber, c.customerName, SUM(od.quantityOrdered * od.priceEach) AS totalSales FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customerNumber = o.customerNumber JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderNumber = od.orderNumber WHERE c.country = 'France' GROUP BY c.customerNumber, c.customerName ORDER BY totalSales DESC;
